English classes help employees reach the level of English necessary for free communication and better carrying out project activities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The courses are designed primarily for production staff, whose English language proficiency is in the range between A0 and B2+. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"letter-spacing\":\"0px\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f75be619-a57e-4522-8376-add20c7e4969/image2018-12-26_10-49-38.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":640,\"height\":67}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Take English Assessment to define your language level that will be displayed in your UPSA profil\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Meet the target audience requirements (production staff А0–В2+).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Monitor the registration for courses (you will receive e-mail notifications). Participation in classes is possible only if there are free places in the grou\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"English Classes are very popular. Therefore, all employees (level A0–B2+) who are not enrolled in the course of appropriate level due to the lack of available places are added to the waiting list. Their Resource Managers will be notified about that. Resource Managers prioritize the training requests of their team
